attributes.action: Be honest about MASS migration effect. Resentment up in ALL sections of society:
attributes.additional_details:
Political correctness gone too far.You know theres a problem when many non-white Brits are now saying there is too much migration. 
There is a 'Culture of Resentment' building against migrants-some lived here for generations.Fueled by fact public services getting worse.Government also for balance need to teach people of the hundreds of millions of emigrants to the New World since 1492 from Europe.Also why are mostly Muslim refugees coming to Christian Europe-NOT nearby rich Islamic Arab nations?
attributes.background: Tony Blair's government deliberately lift 8 year EU controls in 2004-UK seen biggest net migration in history.People in their millions of all colours have arrived in the UK with the NHS/surgeries/schools/roads/housing ALL at breaking point-rents doubled in last 10 years-UK now most overcrowded in EU

rejection.details: If you could start a petition with a clear request for an action, we could look at this again.
